ResourceHeader.Description: The High Energy Telescope (HET) is one of 7 instruments in the STEREO In-Situ Measurements of Particles and CME Transients (IMPACT) investigation. With a linear array of six solid state detectors, it measures protons and helium ions up to 100 MeV/n and electrons up to 5 MeV. For more informaiton, see http://www.srl.caltech.edu/STEREO/docs/STEREO-HET-SSR.pdf.

InformationURL.Name: NSSDC's Master Catalog
InformationURL.Description: In-Situ Measurements of Particles and CME Transients (IMPACT) experiment on the STEREO B mission.

Instrument.InvestigationName: In-Situ Measurements of Particles and CME Transients (IMPACT) Low Energy Telescope on STEREO B
